title: Crime Alert 09.04.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 09.04.19
description:
Teen boy held in the beating death of a 3-year-old. Man baits razor blades with peanut butter to hurt animals. Man sued Popeye's over new sandwiches. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
